title: Unusual Things to Do in Miami
abstract: Discover the quirky side of Miami with a collection of unconventional activities that celebrate the city's vibrant culture and diverse community.

services.intro: Explore Miami's counterculture with a day dedicated to free spirits and creative expression.

list: Visit the Wynwood Walls for stunning street art.
Join a drum circle at Virginia Key Beach.
Attend a local music festival featuring indie artists.

services.intro: For those who find solace in books, Miami offers a literary adventure filled with unique libraries and bookshops.

list: Browse rare finds at the Books & Books store in Coral Gables.
Join a book club at the Miami Beach Library.
Attend an author reading at the Miami Book Fair.

services.intro: Experience Miami from above with stunning rooftop views that offer a unique perspective of the city skyline and vibrant atmosphere.

list: Sip cocktails and enjoy breathtaking views at Rosa Sky, where the vibrant ambiance meets delicious drinks.
Unwind at Oasis, a lush rooftop garden that combines nature with stunning skyline vistas, perfect for relaxation and gatherings.
Indulge in a lively night out at the Rooftop at E11even, known for its energetic vibe and panoramic views of Downtown Miami.

Things to do.name: Fire Dancing at Skatebird
Things to do.description: Join a vibrant community of performers for an electrifying night of fire dancing, where the rhythm of music meets the mesmerizing dance of flames.

Things to do.name: Urban Foraging with Dropped Fruit Map
Things to do.description: Embark on a scavenger hunt across the city to discover nature's bounty with a community-driven map highlighting the best spots for foraging fruit.

Things to do.name: 420 Yoga at Space
Things to do.description: Unwind with a unique blend of yoga and relaxation, accompanied by the soothing effects of plants in a serene environment.

Things to do.name: Rock Climbing at Velocity
Things to do.description: Challenge yourself with a thrilling indoor rock climbing experience at Velocity, suitable for all skill levels. Meet fellow climbers and enjoy a supportive atmosphere.

Things to do.name: Miami Main Branch Library
Things to do.description: Delve into Miami's literary treasures at the Main Branch Library, where you can find rare books, attend workshops, and explore the innovative space.

Things to do.name: Crandon Park Zoo Ruins
Things to do.description: Explore the haunting beauty of the Crandon Park Zoo ruins, where nature reclaims the remnants of the past. A perfect spot for photography and quiet reflection.
